statements: SELECT * FROM medical_images WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT id, image_url FROM medical_images WHERE upload_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_url, upload_date, uploaded_by FROM medical_images WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM medical_images WHERE patient_id = 456 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT image_url, uploaded_by FROM medical_images WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, image_url, patient_id, uploaded_by, upload_date FROM medical_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medical_images WHERE patient_id = 1234 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, uploaded_by FROM medical_images ORDER BY patient_id ASC, upload_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS image_count, uploaded_by FROM medical_images GROUP BY uploaded_by HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS image_count FROM medical_images GROUP BY patient_id HAVING image_count >= 3;

SELECT * FROM medical_images WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT user_name, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalImages ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalImages.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Patients.date_of_birth, COUNT(MedicalImages.image_id) AS image_count FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalImages ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalImages.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name, Patients.date_of_birth;
